mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p WHERE exists( select a.id from sys_role_permission a join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id join sys_user_role c on c.role_id = b.id join sys_user d on d.id = c.user_id where p.id = a.permission_id AND d.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and p.del_flag = 0 order by p.sort_no ASC

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.url,p.perms,p.icon FROM sys_permission p WHERE exists( select a.id from sys_role_permission a join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id join sys_user_role c on c.role_id = b.id join sys_user d on d.id = c.user_id where p.id = a.permission_id AND d.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and p.del_flag = 0 and p.is_route = 1 order by p.sort_no ASC

SELECT p1.id,p1.parent_id,p1.component_name,p1.component,p1.icon,p1.perms FROM sys_permission p1 WHERE p1.parent_id in ( SELECT p.id FROM sys_permission p WHERE exists( select a.id from sys_role_permission a join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id join sys_user_role c on c.role_id = b.id join sys_user d on d.id = c.user_id where p.id = a.permission_id AND d.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.is_route = 1 ) ) and p1.del_flag = 0 order by p1.sort_no ASC
